message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you first because I believe it would be highly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $12,000. Let me know if this is something we can work with.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't sell it for less than $13,500.  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but unfortunately, I can't go above $12,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
